snippet: According to a baseball executive with knowledge of the situation, Jorge Posada has told teammates that he plans to retire rather than attempt to play for another team at 40.
abstract: Jorge Posada is planning to retire after 17 seasons with the New York Yankees; has reportedly said to teammates that he would rather retire than attempt to play for another team at 40 years old.
lead_paragraph: According to a baseball executive with knowledge of the situation, Jorge Posada has told teammates that he plans to retire rather than attempt to play for another team at 40.

headline.seo: Posada Expected to Retire as a Yankee
headline.main: Posada Expected to Retire as Yankee
headline.print_headline: After 17 Seasons as a Yankee, Posada Is Expected to Retire
